content: OCBC UOB OCBC Titanium Rewards Card UOB Preferred Platinum Visa Card Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 04 Jun 2018For those chasing air miles, any thoughts on whether one should get UOB Preferred Platinum Visa (PPV) or OCBC Titanium Rewards (if one is to choose between the two)?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

YY Yin YuLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 08 Jun 2018If i were you, i would get OCBC Titanium Rewards. At the moment, there is a partnership promotion that allows you to earn up to 11 miles per dollar. Take a look at this page which explains the calculation. ​http://milelion.com/2018/04/19/ocbc-titanium-rewards-offering-6-mpd-on-mileslife/​By the way, i don't use either of the cards above, i use Citi Rewards, Ascend Amex, Maybank Horizon and DBS World Woman Card to collect miles. One card is not enough to cater for my different needs. ​0 comments0
